name: Pepper.com
description: Pepper.com is the deal community - hottest deals by and for price-conscious users. Around the clock the community seeks and finds the best offers in fashion, electronics, traveling and much more. With 400 million page views, over 20 mln users and over 50,000 user submitted deals per month across communities in America, Europe and Asia, Pepper has quickly risen to be the largest community deal platform worldwide.
contribution:
My responsibilities include:
- delivering features with design & backend teams
- implementing reusable, solid and fast responsive frontend components
- identifying and fixing performance & maintenance problems
- ongoing improvement of frontend infrastructure
- staying up to date with new frontend technologies and best-practices, sharing and continuous implementing it to the projects

name: Magento 2
description: Magento is an open-source e-commerce platform written in PHP. Magento 2 is a latest release of this eCommerce platform. It has many new and improved features, and its architecture is quite different from all the previous versions.
contribution:
As core developer of Magento 2 e-commerce open-source CMS platform my responsibilities included: 
providing cutting-edge frontend technologies, improving and speeding up frontend development processes, increasing platform performance, taking part in creation of frontend architecture, providing code standardization, search engine optimization, accessibility & microdata support, writing documentation.
Code reviewing and direct development. Video tutorials creation and public speaking.

name: PeopleSmart.com
description: People search engine for US market. Huge project, hundreds pages and more than 40 million visitors per month.
contribution:
I came to this project with a view to completely renovate frontend. 
 At that time was already going transition of backend part and I enthusiastically flowed into project. 
 
 Developed a modular and flexible FED architecture, which has improve the speed of development in several times and maintain responsive and mobile versions of the 6 different sites: 
 - peoplesmart.com 
 - freephonetracer.com 
 - emailfinder.com 
 - phonedetective.com 
 - peopleverified.com 
 - identitysmart.com 

 Ð¡learly organized work with views and scripts, often work in back end part to make it happen. 
 Designed and written missing documentation. Increased collaboration inside team and between FED and Design, QA, Back End and PM teams. 
 Considerable period of time managed work of FED team. 
 Introduced code review practice, constantly trained team conducting in-house seminars and monitors external events, mentored newcomers.

name: FreePhoneTracer.com
description: One of the PeopleSmart project satellites. Part of Consolidated Member Area.

description: One of the PeopleSmart project satellites. Part of Consolidated Member Area.

description: One of the PeopleSmart project satellites. Part of Consolidated Member Area.

name: PeopleVerified.com
description: One of the PeopleSmart project satellites. Part of Consolidated Member Area.

name: Federation Hockey of Russia
description: Federation Hockey of Russia official site news portal.
contribution:
I do not particularly liked hockey, until I got to the live game. It was awesome, our local Kyiv team "Sokil" crushed Russian team "Titan" from Klin. So dynamic game. 
 How I was surprised when I was offered over time to take a part in development of Federation Hockey of Russia official site. 
 Classic design, I can't say nothing special about technologies, you know this russians. I just provide mocks & UI scripts.

name: Moneyhouse.com
description: European market search engine project. Mothership for all Moneyhouse country projects.
contribution:
The main objective of this project was to build a modular architecture that can be re-use on other sites such as: 
 - Moneyhouse.li 
 - Moneyhouse.at 
 - Moneyhouse.de 
 
 The difficulty has been in the absence of design, so I made it by myself. Sometimes you jut had to play the role of the designer, offering different options for the various pages or decisions. Instead of Swiss PHP site that was completely on ASP.NET environment.

name: Moneyhouse.ch
description: One of the most popular Switzerland sites. Top 5 and 4 million users in 2013. Recently included in NZZ Mediengruppe
contribution: I worked on new for that time on new project Moneyhouse.com for European market. Possible to say that Moneyhouse.ch is his parent. It's project with more then ten-year history and like all long-lived projects it needed refactoring. Due Swiss conservatism, it was necessary to change only the inner part by updating technologies and leave classic design. It was successfully done. Was inherited modular and expandable UI architecture from Moneyhouse.com, CSS was rewritten on LESS preprocessor. Suggested some improvements to existing scripts and written new. Work took place in PHP Yii environment

name: Moneyhouse.li
description: European market search engine project.
contribution:
There is a lot of Moneyhouse projects that use a common architecture 
 - Moneyhouse.li 
 - Moneyhouse.at 
 - Moneyhouse.de 
 
 I wouldn't count all. Just will keep here first one that appear in Lichtenstein. The difficulty for all this sites was absence of design, it was necessary to re-create the form of classical Moneyhouse.c to all satellites. Sometimes had to play the role of the designer, offering different options for the various pages or decisions. Instead of Swiss PHP site that was completely on ASP.NET environment.

name: Mustard.ch
description: Swiss site for companies feedback gathering. Seems after sale of the Moneyhouse this project was frozen.
contribution: During working on Moneyhouse.ch I was tasked with developing a new site search to gather feedback about the various swiss companies. I have developed several design options, drew logo, prepared color scheme, conducted design work. And afterwards implemented everything in code.

name: AdQuality.ch
description: AdQuality is advertisement project for selling AD to Moneyhouse sites. Seems after sale of the Moneyhouse this project was frozen.
contribution: One page site with a lot of woo events, such as sliders, clouds, jumping navigation etc.

name: Cost of Life
description: Moscow market project targeted on auto owners. Designed to help be more oriented in car service prices and cost of different models life.
contribution: I was part of friendly enthusiastic team with cool startup idea. Developed responsive UI with help of Less. Wrote some JS plugins. Worked in view part of ASP.NET.

name: Extra Swiss
description: Swiss design studio startup. Unfortunately have no idea why it wasn't started
contribution: Nothing special. Responsive markup, plain HTML5, some UI scripts.

name: My Call Systems
description: My Call Systems is innovation telephone informing project of a subscriber base with the possibility of receiving feedback from clients.
contribution:
Very interesting project in terms of functionality and using technologies, node.js, backbone.js, jade, less etc. With reach UX. 
 I was working on UI part inside environment mostly with view part of backbone.js. Build UI from zero to serve 4 projects: 
 - My Call Systems 
- My Site Calls Me 
 - My Call Informer 
 - My Conference Call 
 
 Which use different color schemes and have own functionality.

name: My Call Informer
description: My Call Informer is satellite of My Call Systems (MCS)
contribution: Main difference between it and MCS is functionality and target group. In terms of my work it use the same core as MCI, have own color scheme.
